question: 1. A technician is setting up a new desktop computer and will be installing the hard drive directly on the motherboard without using cables. What will the technician be installing?

2. An organization has some computers running macOS and some computers running Windows. The computers running macOS also need to run a piece of software that is only available on Windows. Which of the following BEST describes the solution for running Windows software on a computer running macOS?
3. A technician replaced a motherboard on a server, and now the 64-bit hypervisor is not loading correctly. Which of the following needs to be enabled for the hypervisor to run?

4. A Microsoft Windows user is preparing to work in another country and needs to comply with corporate policy for data protection when copying files to portable media. Which of the following solutions would MOST likely satisfy this requirement?

answers.text: A. A USB 3.1 flash drive with BitLocker to Go installed
B. An SD memory card with NTFS
C. An xD memory card with ext3
D. A portable hard drive with FAT32

question: 5. A customer reports that access to the network fileshare has become much slower than usual, but local applications do not seem to have trouble. The technician checks the download bandwidth and finds no issues. Which of the following should the technician check NEXT?

answers.text: B. Customer use of two-factor authentication
C. Amount of local drive space

question: 6. Which of the following is a valid use for PaaS?

answers.text: C. A virtual server installation and configuration model
D. A web application for asset management

question: 7. An IT manager discovered that hundreds of pages of printed materials are being recycled each day because the materials are left on the printer tray instead of being picked up by users. Which of the following would BEST prevent this waste?

answers.text: A. Send friendly reminders to not print unnecessarily.
B. Enable duplex printing to reduce paper utilization.
C. Bill each department for the excess material cost.
D. Require a code or badge before releasing a print job.

question: 8. Which of the following BEST describes a feature of a virtual desktop?

answers.text: A. User profile is saved locally
B. User can customize the physical monitor layout
C. User data is stored on a central server
D. User must log in using a dedicated device

question: 9. A technician needs to document the wiring for a network. Which of the following diagrams would the technician use?

10. A technician is setting up a printer on the network. The technician wants the printer to have the same IP address even after the printer or network reboots. Which of the following should the technician use?
11. Which of the following BEST describes a benefit of using an open-source operating system?
12. A user reports that a laser printer is printing blank pages. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?

answers.text: A. The fuser assembly is not heating properly.
B. The toner cartridge is empty.
C. The transfer roller is damaged.
D. The printer is out of paper.

question: 13. A company has moved from local email servers to a cloud-based email system. Which of the following is the MOST likely reason for this change?
14. A user needs to collaborate on a document with a coworker in another office location. Which of the following tools would be BEST for this task?
15. Which of the following cable types is MOST commonly used to connect a laptop to an external monitor?
16. A user is unable to connect to a wireless network. Which of the following tools would BEST help the technician determine the cause?
17. A technician receives an error message that a file is corrupted and cannot be read. Which of the following tools should the technician use to attempt a repair?
18. A user is experiencing intermittent system crashes. Which of the following should the technician check FIRST?
19. A technician wants to create a backup that includes all files that have changed since the last full backup. Which of the following methods should the technician use?
20. A user is setting up a new SOHO router and wants to protect it against unauthorized access. Which of the following should the user do FIRST?

answers.text: B. Change the default admin credentials

question: 21. A company is hosting a web server that should only be accessible via HTTPS. Which of the following should the administrator configure to ensure this?

answers.text: A. Firewall rule to block TCP port 80
C. ACL to allow TCP port 443

question: 22. A user is trying to connect to a website using HTTPS, but the browser is showing a security certificate warning. Which of the following is MOST likely the cause?

answers.text: B. The website is using HTTP
C. The browser cache is full
D. The website is blocked by firewall

question: 23. A technician is configuring a new computer that will be used to host multiple VMs for development purposes. Which of the following resources should be MOST important when determining the specifications for this system?
24. A technician suspects a malicious process is consuming system resources. Which of the following tools can the technician use to verify this suspicion?
25. A user contacts the help desk to report a newly installed printer is not printing documents. Which of the following is the FIRST step the technician should take?

answers.text: B. Restart the print spooler service
C. Check the print queue for errors

question: 26. Which of the following devices should be used to ensure a consistent power level is supplied to a desktop PC?

27. A user is working on a laptop and notices the screen appears very dim. The user adjusts the brightness function key, but the screen does not change. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?
28. A user is unable to open an encrypted email from a client. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?
29. A company uses software that requires frequent updates. Which of the following licensing models would be the BEST choice?
30. A technician is attempting to fix a slow computer. Which of the following should the technician do FIRST?
31. Which of the following connector types is typically used for fiber-optic cables?
32. A user reports the inability to browse the web. The technician determines the user can ping internal and external IP addresses. Which of the following is MOST likely the issue?
33. A user reports that the time on a workstation resets after every reboot. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?
34. A user wants to share a printer with multiple computers on the network. Which of the following should the technician configure?
35. Which of the following security features is used to prevent a laptop from being removed from a desk?
36. A technician wants to ensure a server remains powered during a blackout. Which of the following should the technician install?
37. A user reports that they are unable to connect to a shared drive. The technician verifies the network connection is working. Which of the following should the technician check NEXT?
38. A company wants to allow guests to connect to the internet but not access the internal network. Which of the following should the technician configure?
39. A technician is installing a printer on a user's laptop. The laptop is connected to the network via Wi-Fi. Which of the following should the technician configure?
40. Which of the following protocols is used to retrieve emails from a remote server?

41. A technician is setting up a workstation for a new employee. The user needs access to a specific network folder but should not be able to change or delete any files. Which of the following permissions should be assigned?
42. A company has replaced many local applications with cloud-based solutions. Which of the following is a benefit of this approach?

answers.text: A. Less need for internet connectivity

question: 43. A user cannot access a file on the network. The technician verifies the network connection is active. Which of the following should the technician check NEXT?
44. A technician is troubleshooting a network issue and wants to check the IP address and default gateway of a Windows PC. Which of the following commands should the technician use?
45. A user reports that a laptop is not charging when plugged in. The technician verifies the power adapter is working correctly. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?

46. A technician is preparing a Windows 10 laptop to give to a new user. The technician wants to ensure that none of the previous user's data remains. Which of the following should the technician perform?

answers.text: B. Create a new user account
D. Rename the old user account

question: 47. A technician is setting up a small office network. All devices should communicate with each other and access the internet. Which of the following devices should the technician install?
48. A user has too many startup programs launching at boot time, which is slowing down the system. Which of the following tools would BEST help resolve this issue?
49. Which of the following commands would a technician use to test connectivity to a remote server?
50. A user received a suspicious email asking for a password reset. Which of the following BEST describes this type of threat?
51. A company wants to restrict access to its wireless network to authorized devices only. Which of the following should the administrator configure?
52. A user is trying to print a document but the printer is showing as offline. Which of the following should the technician check FIRST?
53. A user is unable to access shared files on a server but can browse the internet. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?
54. A technician is upgrading a PC’s RAM. Which of the following should the technician do FIRST?
55. A technician needs to change the default boot order on a Windows laptop. Which of the following should the technician access?
56. A user suspects someone is accessing their account without permission. Which of the following should the user do FIRST?
57. A user’s mobile phone is unable to download emails when connected to public Wi-Fi. Which of the following is the MOST likely reason?

answers.text: B. Phone is out of storage

question: 58. Which of the following would BEST protect against unauthorized access to a laptop if it is stolen?
59. A user is receiving a 'No Boot Device Found' error. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?
60. A technician receives a report that a user’s computer is infected with malware. Which of the following should the technician do FIRST?

answers.text: A. Disconnect the computer from the network

question: 61. A user is experiencing frequent pop-up ads and slow performance on a Windows computer. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?
62. A technician is setting up a new computer in a public kiosk. Which of the following account types should be configured?
63. A technician needs to add more USB ports to a computer. Which of the following should the technician use?
64. A technician is upgrading a user’s laptop hard drive to an SSD. Which of the following actions should the technician take FIRST?
65. A company wants to ensure that only authorized devices can connect to its wireless network. Which of the following should be implemented?
66. Which of the following is used to assign IP addresses automatically to network devices?
67. A technician is asked to configure a mobile device so it can share its internet connection with a laptop. Which of the following should the technician enable?
68. A user reports that a USB drive is not recognized when plugged into a desktop. Which of the following should the technician do FIRST?

answers.text: C. Try a different USB port

question: 69. A user needs to connect a monitor to a laptop. Which of the following connection types is MOST likely to be used?
70. A technician needs to dispose of several old hard drives that stored sensitive company data. Which of the following methods should be used?
71. A technician wants to install a printer for office users to share. Which of the following types of printers is BEST suited for this scenario?
72. A technician is troubleshooting a computer that frequently overheats and shuts down. Which of the following should the technician check FIRST?
73. Which of the following security threats is MOST likely being used when a user is tricked into clicking a malicious link in an email?
74. Which of the following devices would MOST likely be used to digitize documents?
75. A technician is installing an operating system on a new computer. Which of the following installation types should be used to ensure no old data remains?
76. A technician is upgrading a hard drive and wants to transfer the user’s OS and data to the new drive. Which of the following should the technician use?
77. A user is concerned about unauthorized access to a mobile device. Which of the following would BEST help secure the device?
78. A technician is setting up a new wireless router. Which of the following security settings should be configured FIRST?
79. A technician is replacing a power supply in a desktop PC. Which of the following should the technician do FIRST?
80. A technician is setting up an IP camera on a network. Which of the following IP configurations should be used to ensure the camera is always accessible?
81. Which of the following backup types backs up all selected files regardless of the archive bit?
82. Which of the following devices is MOST likely to use a TRRS connector?
83. Which of the following expansion cards should be installed to record from a game console?
84. A user wants to prevent access to specific websites. Which of the following should be configured?
85. A technician is upgrading a graphics card. Which of the following must be verified to ensure compatibility?
86. A technician is setting up a network printer and needs to assign it a permanent IP address. Which of the following should be used?
87. A user is reporting that a smartphone is overheating. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?
88. Which of the following storage devices uses flash memory?
89. Which of the following is used to protect data from power loss?
90. A user needs to send a secure email. Which of the following protocols should be used?
91. A technician is configuring a SOHO router and wants to prevent unauthorized wireless devices from connecting. Which of the following should be implemented?
92. Which of the following is used to provide network segmentation?
93. Which of the following is the BEST method for wiping data from an SSD?
94. A user needs to work from home and access files on a corporate network. Which of the following technologies should be used?
95. Which of the following BEST describes the function of a print spooler?
96. A user reports that a laptop screen is very dim even when brightness is increased. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?
97. Which of the following network devices filters traffic based on IP addresses?
98. A technician is installing additional memory in a computer. Which of the following is the MOST important consideration?
99. A user wants to connect to a wireless network using the most secure method available. Which of the following should be selected?
100. Which of the following commands is used to display the route packets take to a destination?

101. A user is researching hard drives to upgrade a PC and has decided to purchase a NVMe drive. Which of the following should the user confirm are available on the PC before making the purchase? (Choose two.)

102. A salesperson is using a weather application on a mobile device. The application appears to be draining the device's battery very quickly. Which of the following is the BEST action for the salesperson to take in order to view weather forecasts while travelling?

answers.text: A. Enable the GPS service to ensure accurate location detection.
B. Manually enter office locations in the weather application.
C. Configure less frequent location checks using cellular location services.
D. Use the offices' Wi-Fi IP addresses as the geolocation mechanism.
